triples.name: Automatic image annotation
triples.relevance: WavCaps extends automatic annotation techniques from images to audio domain for caption generation.

triples.name: ChatGPT
triples.relevance: ChatGPT is the key LLM used in the three-stage pipeline to filter noisy descriptions and generate high-quality captions.

triples.name: Multimodal learning
triples.relevance: Audio-language multimodal learning is the core research area that WavCaps dataset enables and supports.

triples.name: Sound recognition
triples.relevance: Sound event detection datasets are a source of audio clips used in constructing the WavCaps dataset.

triples.name: Natural language processing
triples.relevance: NLP techniques underpin the caption generation and text transformation processes in WavCaps pipeline.

triples.name: Large language model
triples.relevance: Large language models like ChatGPT are leveraged to enhance the data processing and caption quality in WavCaps.

triples.name: Natural language generation
triples.relevance: WavCaps applies NLG techniques to automatically generate captions from audio descriptions.
